reviewText: I reached out to Mr Arrington on facebook and he has copies of The farley Family Reunion on DVD available right now!!!! They are $20.00 plus $5.00 shipping!
Great 90's Mormon version of how strange and different families can be.  That is what is great about families.  We love each other no matter how off the deep end they are.
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!! I would LOVE to see this on dvd as well!  We wore out our tape long ago and it would be great to see this again!

This is a piece of work!  We have watched it over and over and have adopted many of the one-liners and woven them into our lives.  Additionally, we are convinced that the author was hiding in the bushes at our own family reunion, and we just might be due some royalties!!!
Our VHS tape is obsolete and we would love to have this on DVD.  Wheat's up!
